alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued April 01 at 3:10AM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH TUESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 9 to 15 inches possible. Lesser amounts of 2 to 5 inches over the northern Green River Basin. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains, Southern Lincoln County, Sublette County, Sweetwater County, the Green Mountains, and the Rattlesnake Range. * WHEN...From Sunday evening through Tuesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Heavy snow could reduce visibilities at times and create slick driving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow may melt during the day, especially on paved surfaces, resulting in accumulations less than forecasted totals.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Sweetwater County; Flaming Gorge; Green Mountains and Rattlesnake Range; Rock Springs and Green River; South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
